name: Text1
human_description: Enter your legal first name as it appears on your official documents.

name: Text2
human_description: Enter your legal last name (family name) as it appears on your official documents.

name: Text3
human_description: Enter your date of birth in the format MM/DD/YYYY.

name: Text4
human_description: Indicate whether you have ever been a member of, or in any way associated (either directly or indirectly) with, a totalitarian party. This is typically a 'Yes' or 'No' question.
